sentences: Michael Maximino C. Elgar (born May 8, 1976) is a Filipino musician currently performs as a guitarist and one of the lead vocalists for the band Rivermaya.
He has been the band's longest serving guitarist, ever since he joined in May 2001.
When he was 13 years old, he already formed a band and played his first gig and in 1992 (15 years old), he is already a national guitar champion.

He was later recruited by Rivermaya in May 2001 with Japs Sergio (from Daydream Cycle) and Kakoy Legaspi (from Mr. Crayon) after the departure of the original bassist Nathan Azarcon and session/touring guitarist J-John Valencia (who left by Summer of 2001).
